decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Location Plan; Location Plan (ref: S10603H-2 1 of 3); Site Plan (ref: S10603H-2 2 of 3); Plan view, Section & Rear Elevation of Proposed Grandstand (ref: S10603H-2 3 of 3); Coach Parking Plan; Disabled Car Parking Plan; Cycle Parking Provision; Transport Statement REV.2; Planning Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| Three cycle parking spaces shall be provided onsite and located in a secure undercover lockable compound, prior to the first occupation of the development permitted and retained thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of highway and pedestrian safety in accordance with policies 1.1 f of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policy T5 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| One disabled parking space shall be provided and retained for the lifetime of the development hereby approved.

Reason: To ensure appropriate disabled person and enlarged car parking is provided in accordance with Policy T6 .5 of The London Plan and Ealing's Supplementary Planning Document 'Sustainable Transport for New Development'.
| Prior to the first occupation of the development, a minimum of eight (8) coach parking bays shown on approved drawings shall be provided onsite and retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure appropriate onsite coach parking is provided in accordance with Policy T6 of The London Plan and Ealing's Supplementary Planning Document 'Sustainable Transport for New Development'.
description: Installation of a prefabricated stand with capacity of 496 seats on south eastern side of the stadium pitch
